lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What was the name of the tent God told Moses to build?
answers: The Tabernacle
The Temple
The Meeting Hut
The Snack Shack

questions.text: What was the first thing God told Moses to build for the Tabernacle?
answers: The Ark of the Covenant
The Treasure Chest
The Golden Statue
The Golden Bookstand

questions.text: How is the Ark of the Covenant described?
answers: A gold-covered chest with cherubim facing each other on the cover
A wooden box with stone handles
A golden table with bread on it
A tall lamp with seven lights

questions.text: How is the Table of Showbread described?
answers: Covered in gold, with twelve loaves placed on it weekly
Made of stone with incense burned on it
A wooden table used for making meals
A shelf for storing scrolls

questions.text: How is the Golden Lampstand described?
answers: It had seven lamps and looked like an almond tree
It held candles shaped like animals
It was a single torch on a pole
It was a bowl of oil

questions.text: How is the Altar of Incense described?
answers: A gold-covered stand where priests burned sweet-smelling incense
A large stone altar used for animal sacrifices
A bronze table placed outside the tent
A box used to store spices

questions.text: Who did God pick to work in the temple?
answers: Priests
Prophets
Pastors
Tabernacle-heads

questions.text: What happened when the Tabernacle was set up and items placed inside?
answers: God’s glory filled it
Fire fell from the sky
The tent collapsed
A great earthquake

questions.text: What were the two rooms of the Tabernacle called?
answers: The Holy Place and the Most Holy Place
The Inner Room and the Outer Room
The Priest Room and the People Room
The Light Room and the Dark Room

questions.text: Why don’t we need a Tabernacle to meet with God today?
answers: Jesus shed his blood on the cross to pay for our sins
God meets us in a temple now
God became tired of living in a tent
The priests retired
